author: Special Correspondent
text: Four senior police officers, who were recently promoted as the Director General of Police, called on Chief Minister Jayalalithaa on Tuesday. Chennai Police Commissioner T.K. Rajendran, Tamil Nadu Uniformed Services Recruitment Board Chairman S. George, K. Radhakrishnan of Civil Supplies CID and K.P. Maghendran (Training) called on the Chief Minister at the Secretariat, an official release stated.
title: Police officers call on CM
